# List of wars involving the Republic of China__disambig_1

This is a list of wars involving the Republic of China.

* Briefly reinstallation of the last emperor of the Qing dynasty, Puyi, to the throne
* Restoration quickly reversed by Republican troops

|style="background:#efefef"|

**  (from 1932)

|style="background:#efefef"|
----
Muslim Turkic rebels
|style="background:#efefef"|  Xinjiang clique
|style="background:#F88" | Provincial government victory
*Sheng Shicai's pro-Soviet regime establishes its rule over the whole territory of Xinjiang province.
|-
|style="background:#efefef"| Second Sino-Japanese War(1937–1945)
|style="background:#efefef"|
|style="background:#efefef"|
|style="background:#AFA"| Victory
* Merged into World War II
* Chinese victory as part of the Allied victory in the Pacific War
* Surrender of all Japanese forces in mainland China (excluding Manchuria), Formosa and French Indochina north of 16° north to China
* China becomes a permanent member of the United Nations Security Council
* Resumption of the Chinese Civil War
|-
|style="background:#efefef"| World War II(1939–1945)
|style="background:#efefef"|  Philippines British Malaya
|style="background:#efefef"|
|style="background:#AFA"| Victory
* Collapse of the Third Reich
* Fall of Japanese and Italian Empires
* Creation of the United Nations
* Emergence of the United States and the Soviet Union as superpowers
* Beginning of the Cold War
|-

* Kuomintang
* Republic of China Armed Forces
|style="background:#efefef"|  Yan'an Soviet
(1949)
* Chinese Communist Party
* People's Liberation Army
|style="background:#F88" | Communist victory
* Communist control of mainland China
* Proclamation of the People's Republic of China
* Retreat of the government of the Republic of China to Taiwan
